StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthSummaryNewContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId uniqueidentifier, @Star.ngMonth date.me, @Dura.on int AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @CONTRACT_DATE_BEGIN DATETIME DECLARE @CONTRACT_DATE_END DATETIME
SET @CONTRACT_DATE_BEGIN = CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(@Star.ngMonth))+'-1' SET @CONTRACT_DATE_END = DATEADD(month, @Dura.on, CONVERT(varchar(4), YEAR(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-' + CONVERT(varchar(2), MONTH(@Star.ngMonth)) + '-1')
SELECT RecruiterId INTO #TrainingFile FROM USMC.TrainingFile WHERE ID = @TrainingFileId
SELECT Count(dis.nct c.CONTRACT_ID) AS MonthCount, MONTH(mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) AS CalendarMonth, DATEDIFF(mm, @Star.ngMonth, mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) AS MonthIndex FROM MCRISS.dbo.Person AS p INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine_Candidate AS mc ON p.PERSON_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Nwa AS n ON mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MIContract mi ON mi.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract AS c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID AND c.CONTRACT_ID IN (SELECT min(c2.CONTRACT_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.Person AS p2 INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine_Candidate AS mc2 ON p2.PERSON_ID = mc2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Nwa AS n2 ON mc2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract AS c2 ON n2.NWA_ID = c2.NWA_ID WHERE p2.PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID ) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE m ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = m.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN #TrainingFile . ON m.rowguid = ..RecruiterID WHERE mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE >= @CONTRACT_DATE_BEGIN AND mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE < @CONTRACT_DATE_END GROUP BY MONTH(mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) ,DATEDIFF(mm, @Star.ngMonth, mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) ORDER BY CalendarMonth
DROP TABLE #TrainingFile END
